refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The Stop command stops execution of the current mission at the point that the command is encountered and returns control to the GMAT interface. The effect is similar to that of the Stop button on the GUI toolbar.

refsection.title: GUI
refsection.para: The Stop command can be inserted into and deleted from Mission tree, but the command has no GUI panel of its own.

refsection.title: Remarks
refsection.para: The Stop command stops execution of the current mission, not the GMAT application. All data displayed to the point, at which the script was stopped (e.g. OrbitView windows, GroundTrackPlot windows), remain available for manipulation. Using the Stop command within a loop or solver structure will stop execution at the first iteration during which the command is encountered.
